flawed_nl_solution:
On the way to the library, Trent went 4 blocks + 7 blocks = <<4+7=6>>6 blocks.
Trent came home the same way so he went 6 blocks + 6 blocks = <<6+6=12>>12 blocks.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
